Title: The Seven Burdens of Shaohao
Description:
Dear $p,

It would seem you have discovered the full tale of Shaohao, the last emperor of Pandaria.

If you visit us at the Seat of Knowledge in Vale of Eternal Blossoms we can add this contribution to your personal collection.

Thank you for your diligence!

Sincerely,

Lorewalker Cho
ObjectivesText: Bring The Seven Burdens of Shaohao to Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Knowledge.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Knowledge in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
